metro package
=============

The Python package of METRO, namely metro, can be imported and used through the 
Python 2.7 engine or the embedded Python engine in Aimsun, based on the 
application. For instance, to run only the joint model of departure time and 
mode choice, the package can be used through the regular Python engine. The 
metro package consists of four sub-packages defined in the file 
metro/__init__.py and described in the following subsection.

.. toctree::
    
    metro.trip_assignment
    metro.aimsun
    metro.dcm
    metro.tools

Module contents
---------------

.. automodule:: metro
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
